name: Survivor of The Maze
description:
My 2D shooter created by using UNITY. 2D game project for Coursera course. The following modifications have been made:

  • 3 Additional levels;
  • All levels have unique environment;
  • Created MiniMap;
  • Changed sounds and visual game assets;
  • Set various mission objectives;
  • Objects in the environment can hurt the player;
  • Used Multiple layers for maps;

Credits:

  • SIMPLE FANTASY GUI - Nayrissa
    (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/simple-fantasy-gui-99451)
  •  2D Mega Pack - Brackeys (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/free-2d-mega-pack-177430)

Created by Mangirdas Zavackas
